programme.desc: Glacann Isabelle Huppert le chuile thairiscint a fhaigheann sí & caithfidh Gabriel a sceideal a bhainistiú. (Isabelle Huppert accepts every single offer & Gabriel is forced to manage her schedule.)

programme.title: Call My Agent!
programme.desc: Glacann Isabelle Huppert le chuile thairiscint a fhaigheann sí & caithfidh Gabriel a sceideal a bhainistiú. (Isabelle Huppert accepts every single offer & Gabriel is forced to manage her schedule.)

programme.title: Taste of Australia with Hayden Quinn
programme.desc: Tugann Hayden aghaidh ar na Adelaide Hills agus castar cara air ag na margaí. (Hayden travels to the Adelaide Hills and meets a friend at the markets.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: Cúltír
programme.desc: Rachfar ó chontae go contae ag déanamh ceiliúradh ar amhráin agus ar cheol traidisiúnta na tíre. (A county-by-county celebration of live traditional music and song.)

programme.title: Dúiseacht
programme.desc: Tá cúrsaí an-chiúin fós i gCorca Dhuibhne ag deireadh mhí Meithimh. (It is late June on the Dingle peninsula & streets and car parks are still empty.)

programme.title: Paisean Faisean
programme.desc: Tá cailín amháin ar thóir grá agus triúr fear ag iarraidh í a mhealladh le héadaí deasa! (Take one girl who is looking for love and three guys, whose challenge it is to woo her!)

programme.title: Amhráin is Ansa Liom
programme.desc: Is í Áine Uí Cheallaigh ón Rinn a bheidh ag caint le hAntaine Ó Faracháin ar an gclár seo. (Áine Uí Cheallaigh from An Rinn, Co. Waterford will feature on this programme.)

programme.title: France 24
programme.desc: Cainéal nuachta 24 uair an chloig na Fraince atá i France 24. (FRANCE 24 is France's 24 hour international news channel.)

programme.title: Cúla4
programme.desc: Níl aon easpa cláracha do dhaoine óga ar Cúla4 - bí ag spraoi agus ag foghlaim in éineacht linn. (Younger audiences will be spoilt for choice with Cúla4 - watch, play and learn.)

programme.title: Saol Faoi Shráid
programme.desc: Tá Ribín ag déanamh bronntanais do Ghlibín i ngan fhios dó. (Ribín is making a present for Glibín as a surprise.)

programme.title: Garáiste Gecko
programme.desc: Oíche Shamhna atá ann agus tá na Meicneoirí ag imirt bob nó bia. (The Mechanics go trick or treating on Halloween.)

programme.title: Bíp Bíp Cory Carson
programme.desc: Bíonn Cory ag iarraidh bacóir a fháil ach is léir go mbíonn adharca fada ar na ba thar lear. (Cory wants to get a spoiler, but he figures out that a spoiler isn't all that.)

programme.title: Balloon Barnyard
programme.desc: Tá torann éigin ag coinneáil gach duine ina ndúiseacht. Meas tú cá as a bhfuil an torann ag teacht? (Something is keeping everyone awake. Where could the noise be coming from?)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Nuair a fhuadaíonn eitleog Nat, caithfidh Timmy agus an criú ceann eile a dhéanamh. (After Ranger Nat's kite blows away, the Mechas and Timmy learn to build their own.)

programme.title: Mecha Builders
programme.desc: Má tá an droichead briste cén chaoi a rachaidh an traein trasna na hailte? (The train needs to cross the ravine but the bridge is broken.)

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: Tagann na diabhailíní ar fad le chéile chun na PJ Masks a chloí. (All the villains (not the wolfies) join forces to defeat the PJ Masks forever.)

programme.title: Finny an Siorc
programme.desc: Is é lá breithe Finny atá ann agus tá sí ag ceapadh go bhfuil dearmad déanta ag gach duine ar a lá mór. (It's Finny's Birthday today and she thinks that everyone has forgotten.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Tá Ricky ag iarraidh a fhiacail a tharraingt go dtiocfaidh sióg na bhfiacla chuige. (Ricky is trying his best to lose a tooth so that the tooth fairy will come to visit him.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Bíonn Ricky agus Boo ag iarraidh a bheith chomh cabhrach is a bhfuil siad in ann a bheith inniu. (Today, Ricky and Boo try their very best to be helpful.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Bíonn Ricky curtha soir nuair nach mbíonn sé in ann amhrán a chur as a cheann. (Ricky is up in a heap when he can't get a song out of his head.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Bíonn dul amú ar Tyra agus Ricky agus iad ag úsáid boscaí bruscair nua. (Tyra and Ricky make a mistake while using the new bins for unwanted things.)

programme.title: Dinocity
programme.desc: Téann Ricky agus a chairde chuig an iarsmalann inniu. (Today, Ricky and his friends visit the museum.)

programme.title: Cúla4

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá Nic agus Sailí ag déanamh masc d'Oíche Shamhna agus tá siad ag iarraidh go mbeidh said an-scanrúil. (Nick and Sally are making Halloween masks.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá Nic agus Sailí ag caitheamh a gcuid buataisí nua ach tá siad ag dul i bhfostú sa phuiteach. (Nick and Sally are trying out their new blue rubber boots.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Níl Nic in ann a chleas draíochta a dhéanamh i gceart. (Nick has difficulty learning a "disappearing" magic trick.)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá sé an-te inniu. Meas tú cén chaoi a bhfanfaidh Sailí agus Nic fuar? (Phew! It's hot outside! How are Sally and Nick going to stay cool?)

programme.title: Cat a' Hata
programme.desc: Tá Nic agus Sailí ag iarraidh teacht ar uirlis atá in ann chuile rud a dhéanamh. (Nick and Sally wonder if there's such a thing as a one-thing-does-it-all tool.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Teastaíonn duine éigin ó Olivia a thabharfaidh aire dá pearóid, Priompallán. (Olivia needs someone to mind her pet parrot, Bonaparte.)

programme.title: Zak Jinks
programme.desc: Tá gach uile chárta ag Zak ina bhailiúchán cártaí seachas an cárta óir Morvox. (Zak has every single card in his Stark Trick album...except one; the Golden Morvox.)

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Téann Polly agus a cairde sa tóir ar na gadaithe atá ag goid ó leabharlann na cathrach. (Polly and her friends shrink into tiny detectives to catch some the thieves.)

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Socraíonn Shani cúnamh a thabhairt do thaibhse a chastar uirthi in amharclann. (Shani visits a haunted theatre, where she helps a frightened phantom.)

programme.title: Polly Pocket
programme.desc: Iompaíonn Lila isteach i mBean Uí Lulufoofoo trí thimpiste. (Lila accidentally transforms into Madame Lulufoofoo, forcing her to spend a day in the designer's fab shoes.)

programme.title: Camp Lakebottom
programme.desc: Tá MacAodh agus Buttsquat in árach a chéile faoi cé acu an captaen spáis is fearr. (McGee and Buttsquat argue over whose a better space captain.)

programme.title: Taffy
